1.title: Nalini and Bjorn
1.plot: Join high profile Criminal Defense Lawyer Michael Kuzilny, MK LAW, on award winning TV Show 'Tough Times Never Last'. On this inspiring episode Michael interviews guests; "Bjorn and Nalini Tranquim' where they talk about Bjorn's very rare hereditary degenerative blood disorder; that he was diagnosed with at only 13 years of age and was given "best case scenario" five years to live.

2.title: Warwick Capper
2.plot: Join high profile Criminal Defense Lawyer Michael Kuzilny, MK LAW, on award winning TV Show 'Tough Times Never Last'. On this episode be ready to not only be inspired but also have a good laugh when Michael interviews former AFL star, Warwick Capper, where they discuss life within the AFL, and life when your AFL career comes to an end.

3.title: Charlie Bezzina
3.plot: On this jaw dropping episode Michael interviews guest, Charlie Bezzina, former top homicide detective of Victoria where they discuss the investigation of serial killer Paul Deyner, previous investigations of gangland figures, and issues on the streets of Melbourne, Australia.

4.title: David Kong
4.plot: Michael interviews guest, David Kong, on his life during the war (Ethiopian refugee camp), life settling in Australia, and David's success in helping the community.

imdb.plot outline: Tough Times Never Last is an award winning interview show that was created by prominent Lawyer Michael Kuzilny. Michael runs his own boutique legal firm MK LAW situated in Collins Street, Melbourne. Michael is a former legal affairs editor for Channel 7 Sunrise; and back in 2008, believed that Community TV around Australia needed a show that was "real" and "down to earth" that inspired Australian viewers. Michael Kuzilny has also been awarded the "Best male presenter" Award, at the National TV Antenna awards for his dedicated efforts on the show. Tough Times Never Last is produced by Haris Fazlic "My Last Sunday" (2013), "Rose" (2015) and "Mystical Guides Haunted Australia" (2017) .
imdb.title: Tough Times Never Last
plot: _Tough Times Never Last_ (qv) is an award winning interview show that was created by prominent Lawyer Michael Kuzilny. Michael runs his own boutique legal firm MK LAW situated in Collins Street, Melbourne. Michael is a former legal affairs editor for Channel 7 Sunrise; and back in 2008, believed that Community TV around Australia needed a show that was "real" and "down to earth" that inspired Australian viewers. Michael Kuzilny has also been awarded the "Best male presenter" Award, at the National TV Antenna awards for his dedicated efforts on the show. _Tough Times Never Last_ (qv) is produced by Haris Fazlic "My Last Sunday" (2013), "Rose" (2015) and "Mystical Guides Haunted Australia" (2017) .
